FuncDef: The display arp packet statistics command displays the statistics about Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) packets. The display arp packet statistics command displays the statistics about Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the ARP packets sent and received by a specified Layer 3 interface.
-

ExtraInfo: To locate and rectify ARP faults, you need to view statistics about ARP packets sent and received by the device.
